name: Altcoin Daily Bollinger-Stoch Mean Reverter
description: Mean-reversion crypto strategy trading daily bars of the most liquid altcoins. Long entries when price deviates below the 20-day Bollinger lower band and the Stochastic Oscillator turns up from oversold; shorts mirror the logic above the upper band. Trades exit on re-version to the 20-day SMA, opposite Stochastic extreme, a 3 % hard target or a 1.5 % protective stop ‑- whichever comes first. Each trade risks/allocates 2 % of account equity, keeping overall risk moderate.
